content:
I once saw a snow-covered statue by the sea,
When I went to touch it, it moved! (Eek!)
...Turns out it was just a master fisherman waiting patiently in the snow.

Observing the stars requires a lot of patience,
just like fishing.

Just saw your fishing stance, and in that moment when you cast the line,

it wasn't just bait, but rather

"a connection line to another world" - how impressive~

I once tried a rather unique fishing method,

Wherever the stars twinkled, that's where I cast my line,

Fate is just as mysterious as fishing, don't you think~
